references.paper_title: Deep residual learning for image recognition
references.reason: This paper is essential since ResNet blocks form the underlying architecture for encoders and decoders within the Hybrid UNet.

references.paper_title: U-net: Convolutional networks for biomedical image segmentation
references.reason: This is a key reference as it describes the UNet architecture that is frequently used for 3D scene understanding.

references.paper_title: Exploring data-efficient 3d scene understanding with contrastive scene contexts
references.reason: This paper is used as a baseline and serves as a comparative study to show how well models learn with self-supervision.

references.paper_title: Masked scene contrast: A scalable framework for unsupervised 3d representation learning
references.reason: This paper is used as a baseline and serves as a comparative study to show how well models learn with self-supervision, as well as highlighting an MIM objective.

references.paper_title: Joint 2d-3d-semantic data for indoor scene understanding
references.reason: This paper provided a large dataset which has become a key benchmark in the field.
